.. _examples_gallery:

Gallery of examples
===================

The examples below shows functionalities of scikit-shapes.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">


.. raw:: html

    </div>

Data
----

The data classes are designed to store geometric data and associated features for shape analysis.



.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbnails">
